column5: Our Environmental Engineering MSc will develop you into a employable graduate who will act as a leader and a manager. The programme examines environmental problems like air pollution, energy efficiency, contaminated land and water. The programme equips graduates with a high-level competency in process engineering design, environmental assessment, resource management and technological innovation.The course offers to students with BEng, BSc or non-accredited engineering degrees the skills required to be eligible for Chartered Engineer status. Most applicants have an engineering degree, and the most common include environmental or chemical engineering.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
